abilities.name: Storm Bolt
abilities.description: Throw a hammer, dealing 110 damage to the first enemy hit and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds. Quest: Hit 25 Heroes with Storm Bolt. Heroes who die within 2.5 seconds of being hit by Storm Bolt count as hitting 3 additional Heroes. Reward: Storm Bolt pierces to hit an additional target, and Muradin's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt by 1 second.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Blast nearby enemies for 96 damage and slow them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Heroes hit also have their Attack Speed reduced by 25% for the duration.

abilities.name: Dwarf Toss
abilities.description: Leap to target location, dealing 59 damage to enemies on landing. Upon leaping, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

heroics.name: Haymaker
heroics.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 damage and knocking them aside.

original.name: Muradin
original.title: Mountain King
original.description: Once a mentor to Prince Arthas, Muradin was unable to prevent his corruption. After recovering from a mild case of amnesia, he is now the leader of the Bronzebeard clan after the "diamond-ization" of his brother King Magni.
original.shortDescription: A sturdy Tank that can do well in a multitude of situations.

baseHeroInfo.name: Muradin
baseHeroInfo.title: Mountain King
baseHeroInfo.description: Once a mentor to Prince Arthas, Muradin was unable to prevent his corruption. After recovering from a mild case of amnesia, he is now the leader of the Bronzebeard clan after the "diamond-ization" of his brother King Magni.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A sturdy Tank that can do well in a multitude of situations.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.description: Muradin restores 55 Health per second when he has not taken damage for 4 seconds. When below 40% Health, increased to 111 Health per second.

skins.name: Mountain King
skins.description: Once a mentor to Prince Arthas, Muradin was unable to prevent his corruption. After recovering from a mild case of amnesia, he is now the leader of the Bronzebeard clan after the "diamond-ization" of his brother King Magni.

skins.name: Ymirjar Lord Muradin
skins.description: To siege Icecrown, the Ashen Verdict forged the most powerful armors crafted by man... Meanwhile, Muradin stole a Ymirjar Lord's armor, and kicked everyone's arse.

skins.name: Maraudin' Muradin
skins.description: Based in the Kel-Morian Combine, Three Hammer Securities employs the boldest and baddest mercenaries in the sector. Give them a call when you need to put someone in a world of hurt.

skins.name: Kandy King Muradin
skins.description: Everyone wants to be King of Kandy Mountain... but once a Gummy Dragon shows up, they flee to Sugar Plum Valley like the rest. Heavy is the head that wears the cupcake crown.

skins.name: Magni Muradin
skins.description: It was hard for Magni to accept Moira as member of the Council of Three Hammers, but he knew his deceased brother Muradin would have wanted peace in Ironforge.
